text: Home » Videos » Celeb Interview » “I Am Shah Rukh Khan’s BIGGEST Fan”: KRK | EXCLUSIVE “I Am Shah Rukh Khan’s BIGGEST Fan”: KRK | EXCLUSIVE Sohail Khan Feb 27, 2017 - 1:17 pm IST 0 0 About the video Interview with Content Head broadband Faridoon Shahryar, Kamaal Rashid Khan popularly known as KRK talks about the increase in his fan following on social media and enjoying the success of 3 million followers on social media.
